topic: Cognitive flexibility in adapting to new patterns
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can reveal new insights and foster creativity by disrupting habitual thinking patterns. As a next step, I will experiment with randomly rearranging my existing prompts and document any novel ideas or connections that emerge. This exercise will also involve reflecting on any recurring themes or biases that become apparent through this process.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
